result.msg: THIS NOTEBOOK DEPENDS ON RESULTS FROM PREVIOUS Recommendations/03: NOTEBOOK

paragraphs.title: Top 5 similar users to a given user
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.sql.Row
import com.advancedspark.ml.Similarity 
import com.advancedspark.ml.Vectors

// User 1
val givenUserId = 1
val givenUserFactors = userFactorsDF.select($"userId", $"userFactors")
  .where($"userId" === givenUserId)
  .map(row => row.getSeq[Float](1).toArray.map(_.toDouble))
  .collect()(0)

val givenUserFactorsVector = Vectors.dense(givenUserFactors)

// Find Other Similar Items to the Given Item
val similarUsers = userFactorsDF.select($"userId", $"userFactors")
  .filter($"userId" !== givenUserId)
  .map{ row =>
     val userId = row.getInt(0)
     val otherUserFactors = row.getSeq[Float](1).toArray.map(_.toDouble)
     val otherUserFactorsVector = Vectors.dense(otherUserFactors)
     val similarity = Similarity.cosineSimilarity(otherUserFactorsVector, givenUserFactorsVector)
     (userId, similarity)
  }
  
// Sort and Return Top 5 Items by Similarity to Given Item
val sortedSimilarUsers = similarUsers.top(5)(Ordering.by[(Int, Double), Double] { case (id, similarity) => similarity })

val sortedSimilarUsersDF = sqlContext.createDataFrame(sortedSimilarUsers).toDF("similarUserId", "similarity")

z.show(sortedSimilarUsersDF.select(lit(givenUserId).as("userId"), $"similarUserId", $"similarity"))
